Tolkien-related events that took place in 1902.

content.title: Early
content.content: ? - Mabel Tolkien moves her family, from King's Heath to a house in Edgbaston next door to the Birmingham Oratory and the Grammar School of St. Philip. To save money, Mabel removes the boys from King Edward's School and enrolls them in St. Philips.

content.title: April
content.content:
9 - Lord David Cecil, Inkling, is born.
13 - Godfrey Kenton, the voice of Aragorn and Mablung in the 1955 radio series of The Lord of the Rings, is born.

content.title: September
content.content:
26 - Clyde S. Kilby, literature professor, is born.
Years
1899 1900 1901 1902 1903 1904 1905
